tool_description: Analyzes transactions for fraud risk using multiple detection algorithms and risk scoring models.

velocity_window_hours.description: Time window in hours for velocity checks (1-168)

error_messages: Invalid IP address: IP address format is invalid
Invalid country code: Country code must be valid ISO 3166-1 alpha-2
Customer not found: Customer ID does not exist in system
Invalid velocity window: Window must be between 1 and 168 hours
Insufficient transaction history: Not enough data for reliable risk assessment
usage: Provide transaction details including amount, customer_id, ip_address, payment_method_fingerprint, and billing_country. Optionally include shipping details and device fingerprint for enhanced analysis.

fraud_score.description: Fraud risk score from 0-100 (higher = more risky)

triggered_rules.description: List of fraud detection rules that were triggered
